definition: criminal procedure/abbr. for 刑事訴訟法|刑事诉讼法
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The re-amendment to the criminal procedure law is the focus of academe.
sentences.chinese: 刑訴法再修改問題是當前學界關注的焦點問題。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the Criminal Law has the function of safeguarding the enforcement of the Criminal Procedure Law.
sentences.chinese: 反過來看，刑法也具有保障刑訴法實施的功能。

sentences.english: Our country is in transitional period of criminal procedure law now.
sentences.chinese: 我國目前正處在刑訴法的轉型時期。

sentences.english: Consequently, Chinese criminal procedural should grant the injured independent appeal right.
sentences.chinese: 因而，我國刑訴法應賦予被害人獨立的上訴權。

sentences.english: Criminal Procedure Law has the function of safeguarding the enforcement of Criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 刑訴法具有保障刑法實施的功能。
